strategies.title: Strategies and Solutions
strategies.description: After several months of testing, we decided to develop our own parser. This was the beginning of a long journey 🚀

limitations.title: We tested several parsing services, but each had its limitations:
list: High cost of some services that wasn't justified by real results
All services had volume limitations and constantly blocked accounts

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: We realized that to achieve results, we needed to develop our own solution, that would work on our terms. This became a challenge, as we didn't yet know that scrapers in the market quickly become outdated ⚡️, and we needed not just to extract data, but also quickly adapt the tool to new conditions
